objects.text:
• Elegant design with minimalist icons
• Divided compartments for organization
• Portable handle for easy transport

product_details.name: Modern Kitchen Utensil Caddy - Stylish Flatware Organizer with Handle
product_details.description:
• Elegant white design with minimalist fork and spoon icons
• Portable carrying handle for easy transport
• Divided compartments for organized storage
• Perfect for kitchen countertop organization
• Durable plastic construction - easy to clean
• Space-saving oval design
• Ideal for storing cutlery, cooking utensils, and kitchen tools
• Multi-functional: suitable for home, parties, picnics, or outdoor events
• Modern aesthetic that complements any kitchen decor
• Practical solution for decluttering kitchen drawers

banner_details:
This banner features a promotional layout for a kitchen organizing product. The left half has a solid teal-green background decorated with minimalist geometric shapes and light circular overlays for a modern aesthetic. The "heading" text layer boldly introduces the product in a large, uppercase font, followed by the "subheading" in smaller, sleek typography. The "description" layer lists concise product benefits with bullet points, neatly aligned. The "price" tag is prominent and bold, while a dark rectangle with the "cta" text creates a clear call-to-action button labeled "SHOP NOW". The right half showcases the "product_image" with a white background, drawing attention to the kitchen caddy.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Green: `#49B6A3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Dark Teal: `#004D40`
- Light Teal Circles: `#E8F8F5` (with varying opacity)
product_color: The product image utilizes a minimalist and modern color palette suitable for clean, kitchen-themed advertisement design. The key colors include soft white (#F8F8F8) used for the caddy base, providing a fresh and uncluttered backdrop. Shiny metallic silver (#C0C0C0) dominates the utensils, adding a reflective and polished appearance. Dark charcoal gray (#333333) outlines the fork and spoon illustration, creating clear contrast and helping them stand out. The overall palette blends neutrals while drawing focus with reflective surfaces. This sleek and simple design emphasizes functionality and cleanliness, ideal for banners targeting organized, contemporary kitchen spaces.
